AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: slave warden
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] kept slaves and prisoners of war in-check. Most never even dared to attempt escape under [PAWN_possessive]'s watch. Those that were stupid enough to try weren't going to make it far.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: slave tender
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Someone had to make sure the slaves were in a work-ready state, and that was [PAWN_nameDef]s job. From cleaning wounds to cooking soup, [PAWN_pronoun] would do it all. [PAWN_nameDef] didn't actually care about the slaves though, [PAWN_pronoun] was just in it for the coin.
